text: Ezɨ Delaila Samson gifarazɨma Samson an apozimɨn akuava ongani. Ezɨ Delaila gumazir mamɨn diazɨma a iza Samson dapanir arɨzir gɨzgɨzir nuavizir 7plan ruariba apɨri. Ezɨ Delaila arazir kamɨn Samsonɨn gavgavim bar anegɨfa. An gavgavim bar moghɨra gɨfa.16:19 Hibrun akam deragha mɨgɨrɨgɨar kamɨn mɨngarim abɨghizir puvatɨ.
